svg.text: ITF Tournament Management System - DR Architecture

g.text: • SMS via SNS endpoint (no internet access)
2. Lambda functions process requests → RDS MySQL
1. CloudWatch health check fails (primary region down)
2. Route 53 switches DNS to DR region
3. Lambda promotes RDS read replica → standalone DB
• Lambda in private subnets (no internet access)
• Interface endpoints: Secrets Manager, SNS, CloudWatch
• Tuesday 10:00 GMT: Close tournament entries + seeding
• Friday 20:00 GMT: Publish draw + notify players (SMS)
• 18 normalized tables (Players, Tournaments, Draws, Matches, Rankings)
• Weekly ranking publication with ROW_NUMBER() window functions
• Multi-AZ RDS MySQL with cross-region async replication
• Terraform (IaC) • Lambda (Python) • API Gateway • RDS MySQL
• Route 53 • S3 Static Website • EventBridge • SNS • CloudWatch
• VPC Endpoints (Secrets Manager, SNS, Logs, S3)
